scenario_text.value: (Agumon’s talking with the others...)

We’ve got to do everything we can to help
those kids!
But what can we do...?

A conundrum, indeed... I fear my skills are
limited to battle and guiding in this world.

It’d be good if we could teach them about the
things they don’t know about, but...
Hmm... I don’t know either.

Neither do I. Most of the memories I have
before meeting Minoru are fuzzy at best.

I’m the same... I wonder if remembering would
help us out here?

I would submit that our efforts in battle are
a greater contribution, surely?

Still, I don’t think Aoi or Saki really want
to fight in the first place.

Still, when the time comes we cannot avoid
fighting to protect them, so fight we must.
I mean that’s true, but...

It’s better to have fun! We should all work
together to keep those kids smiling!

Hoh boy... I’m almost jealous of how happy-
go-lucky you can be, Agumon.
Eheheh...
That wasn’t a compliment.
I overheard the whole thing, you guys.
Oh, Takuma!

I’m impressed to think how seriously you all
are thinking about us. It’s great, really.

We cannot come to an accord of our own
devices. What would you have us do, my boy?
Should we teach you about this world?
Should we fight?
Should we yuck it up?!
(I wish all of them would...)
Tell us about the world.
Fight on our behalf.
Help us smile!

I’d be happiest if you taught us about this
world. I bet everyone else feels the same.

I thought so. Still, I don’t know much about
it myself...

Oh, but anything you do know would be a big
help, whenever something comes to mind.

Seriously, every little bit helps. We just
want to get a grip on things around here.

Being in the dark makes us nervous. Plus,
we’ll need knowledge to get back home.
Yeah, that’s true...

Leave it to me, Takuma! If it’s for you guys,
I’ll do everything I can!

I’d say I’d like you to fight for us. Staying
alive is the most important thing here.
Yes, precisely the point.

Just having you guys around gives us greater
peace of mind than you know.

Even at the school, there’s no telling when
something might attack us.

Having friends that can fight by our sides is
the greatest comfort.

So our battle strength translates to strength
of heart for all of you...

Very good. I can feel the motivation well up
within me with such words.

We shall expend all efforts to live up to
your expectations!
I want you guys to help us smile!
You got it! Goochy goochy goo...
Wah, Agumon! That’s, ha ha, that’s not—

That’s not what I meant! I mean, you guys
should stay by our sides.
By your sides?

I don’t think the anxiety we all feel can be
fixed so easily.

That’s why having you around to worry with
us, listen to our complaints, encourage us...

I’m sure it’ll help us smile if you do.
Better than us being down all the time.
So please, everyone. Won’t you stay with us?

Yeah! Don’t worry, Takuma, we’ll always be
with you!
Okay, you guys, we’ve got a lotta work to do!
Right!
Right, right!

(Having these guys around sure is
encouraging.)

(They’re doing their best for our sakes. I’d
better try and keep pace.)
